welcoming.subtitle: Digital Access Management System
welcoming.description: Digitize your business access processes. Provide fast and contactless access with card, QR code or mobile device.

features.digitalAccessDesc: Fast and contactless access with card, QR code or mobile device
features.qrIntegrationDesc: Cost savings with QR code support on existing turnstiles
features.securityControlDesc: Prevents unauthorized access with role-based access management
features.dataAnalyticsDesc: Real-time recording and analysis of access data

benefits.cloudHybrid: Full Cloud and Hybrid system models

services.digitalAccessManagementDesc: We provide fast and contactless access with card, QR code or mobile device.
services.systemIntegrationDesc: We integrate your existing turnstile systems with OxyKeyPass infrastructure at minimum cost.
services.dataAnalyticsReportingDesc: Records access data in real-time, analyzes and provides detailed reports.
services.securityManagementDesc: Prevents unauthorized access, provides role-based access control and prevents security breaches.
services.cloudHybridSystemsDesc: We provide flexible solutions with Full Cloud and Hybrid system models.
services.costSavingsDesc: Reduces physical card usage and eliminates additional hardware costs.

cta.getStartedDesc: Digitize your business access processes with OxyKeyPass. Start with free consultation!

whyOxyKeyPass.title: Why OxyKeyPass?
whyOxyKeyPass.desc: We provide all the password management tools you need for your digital security in a single platform

advantages.title: Our Advantages
advantages.desc: Digitize your business access processes with OxyKeyPass. Increase security and operational efficiency.

whatWeDo.title: What Do We Do for Our Customers?
whatWeDo.desc: We provide comprehensive access management solutions to digitize your business access processes
